meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Israeli Coalition Talks Prime Minister Ehud Barak opened talks with Ariel Sharon, the rightist opposition leader, on forming a coalition government as Israeli-Palestinian violence continued.
Israeli Coalition Talks Prime Minister Ehud Barak opened talks with Ariel Sharon, the rightist opposition leader, on forming a coalition government as Israeli-Palestinian violence continued.
Worth Staying Up Late The Jets, trailing by 30-7 in the fourth quarter, rallied to defeat the Miami Dolphins, 40-37, in overtime to cap the greatest comeback in their history.
The Enigma of Eating What is ''normal'' eating? Researchers haven't defined it yet. But other studies show that being overweight may not mean being out of shape.
Actors' Strike Is Settled A tentative agreement was reached between advertisers and thousands of actors who appear in television commercials, ending a nearly six-month labor dispute.
